attributes.action: Enforce the labeling of all GMO foods and penalize heavily those who dont state clearly on the packet that the food has been adulterated.
attributes.additional_details: Enforce the labeling of all GMO foods and penalize heavily those who dont state clearly on the packet that the food has been adulterated. Educate the public on the dangers of GMO foods and the diseases it bring so that hospital bills can be lowered.
